changeSet.author: Sri Laxmi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Infected", "Clean") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "WWN, Peripheral line status at removal");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to WWN, Peripheral line status at removal

changeSet.author: Sri Laxmi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Infected", "Clean") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "WWN, PICC line status at removal");

changeSet.author: Sri Laxmi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Site, Lip", "Site, Lower lip", "Site, Upper lip", "Site, Eyelid") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "WWN, Site of pain");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to WWN, Site of pain

changeSet.author: Sri Laxmi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Site, Lip", "Site, Lower lip", "Site, Upper lip", "Site, Eyelid") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "WWN, Site of dressing");

changeSet.author: Sri Laxmi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set where concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('WWN, Peripheral line status at removal','WWN, PICC line status at removal'));

changeSet.comment: Add Peripheral line status at removal and PICC line status at removal to Ward Nursing Note form
